attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If it is illegal to drive and use a mobile phone, apply lip stick, eat a sandwich or drink a can of pop. Why is it legal to open a packet of cigarettes, find you lighter, then light the cigarette. Surely this is more of a danger to other road users. Lets stop smoking while driving
